price: Ubwo Shuwayibu yababwiraga ati “Ese ntimwatinya Allah?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
